title: Aria Pendant Light
description: A sculptural pendant light in hand-blown glass with a warm amber interior. Casts a beautiful warm glow — ideal over dining tables or in entryways.
descriptionCn: 手工吹制玻璃雕塑吊灯，内部呈温暖琥珀色。散发美丽的温暖光芒——理想的餐桌上方或玄关灯具。

specifications.materialCn: 手工吹制玻璃，拉丝黄铜
specifications.finishCn: 温暖琥珀玻璃/拉丝黄铜

seo.title: Aria Pendant Light — Julia Studio Shop
seo.description: Hand-blown glass pendant light with warm amber interior and brushed brass hardware.
